KGB Archiver is a compression software that is designed to compress large files to extreme levels without compromising on quality. It is named after the former KGB intelligence agency of the Soviet Union, due to its ability to compress files to such an extent that they become difficult to decrypt. It is a free and open-source tool that has been available for almost a decade, and it is widely used by individuals and organizations to compress and archive their files.

## Features

### High Compression Ratio

One of the main features of KGB Archiver is its high compression ratio. This software uses the PAQ6 compression algorithm, which is a powerful compression method that can compress files to a fraction of their original size. KGB Archiver can compress files up to 10 times smaller than the original file size, which is extremely impressive.

### Encryption

KGB Archiver also offers encryption options to secure the compressed files. Users can choose to encrypt the compressed files using AES-256 encryption algorithm, which is a highly secure encryption method. The password-protected files can be decrypted only by entering the correct password.

### Easy to Use

KGB Archiver is user-friendly, and it has a simple and clean interface that makes it easy to use. Users can easily compress their files by simply selecting the file they want to compress and choosing the compression level. The software does the rest of the work.

### Support for Popular File Formats

KGB Archiver supports a wide range of file formats including 7z, ZIP, RAR, and many others. This means that users can compress and extract files of different formats with ease.

## How to Use KGB Archiver

Using KGB Archiver is easy. Here is a step-by-step guide on how to compress a file using KGB Archiver:

1. Download and install KGB Archiver from the official website.
2. Launch KGB Archiver and click "Add files" to select the file you want to compress.
3. Choose the compression level you want to use.
4. Click on "Next".
5. Choose the folder you want to save the compressed file in.
6. Click "Next" to start the compression process.
7. After the compression is complete, you can encrypt the file if you want to.

## Conclusion

KGB Archiver is a powerful compression software that is designed to compress files to extreme levels without compromising on quality. It is easy to use and offers a wide range of features including high compression ratio, encryption, support for popular file formats, and more. If you need to compress large files and want to save space on your computer or external storage devices, KGB Archiver is definitely worth a try.
